title: Drawing, "Playing Card Motif, Textile Design", 1950–70
medium: Brush and gouache on paper, lined.
description: Playing card motif in white, grey, pink and black, showing hearts, spades, clubs and diamonds.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Playing Card Motif, Textile Design", 1950–70.
1950–70. Brush and gouache on paper, lined.. Gift of Mr. Donald Cameron. 1992-51-66.
